Plan_Ahead.Title: Plan Ahead Specials
Plan_Ahead.Description: Book your next rental car in advance with Plan Ahead Specials and save money on rentals in the U.S and Canada.

Basic.Name: Basic Cover Protection
Basic.Description: Avoid paying for damage or theft of your rental vehicle.

Standard.Name: Standard Cover Protection
Standard.Description: Protect yourself from third party accident or injury claims up to $1M.

Total.Name: Full Cover Protection
Total.Description: Free 24/7 roadside assistance for flat tires, lost keys and dead battery.

NoProtection.Title: Continue without additional protection?
NoProtection.Description: You are liable for all damage and theft up to the full value of the rental vehicle, as well as third party accident and injury claims, plus admin fees. Your personal insurance or credit card may not fully cover this rental.
NoProtection.Skip: Yes, I will take care of any expenses that may be incurred

Detail1.Title: Plan date
Detail1.Description: You'll lose access to your plan immediately.

Detail2.Title: Applications
Detail2.Description: You'll no longer have access to your apps or most of the services included in your paid plan.

Detail3.Title: Storage
Detail3.Description: Cloud storage will be reduced to 5GB. If you exceed this limit, you'll have 90 days to reduce your online usage or you may lose access to some or all stored files.

Home.EmptyEvents: No play with that title was found

1.Description: Dive into an intense psychological drama where emotions and inner dilemmas will keep you on the edge of your seat.
1.Comment2: The play was incredible, the performances really surprised me.
1.Comment3: I enjoyed it a lot, every scene had something unexpected.

2.Description: The story of a fighter facing his biggest challenge both inside and outside the ring, packed with punches and laughs alike.
2.Comment1: I left the theater smiling and thinking about coming back soon.
2.Comment2: Excellent, it manages to move you without being over the top...

3.Description: Experience a unique theatrical journey that intertwines eras and destinies, inviting you to reflect on the choices that shape our lives.
3.Comment1: Bought tickets out of curiosity and ended up fascinated.
3.Comment2: Highly recommended, the script and staging were great...
3.Comment3: The best thing I've seen in theater this year, no doubt.

4.Description: Six women, one house, and zero common sense. Crazy Ladies is an over-the-top comedy where everything can go wrong… and it does. But between laughs, screams and glasses of wine, they discover that shared madness might just be the best therapy.
4.Comment1: Hahaha amazing play, I laughed from start to finish...
4.Comment2: Very good! I went with low expectations and was surprised...
4.Comment3: All six of them nailed it!

5.Description: A drama exploring the conflicts, secrets and intense emotions within a couple on the brink of collapse.
5.Comment1: I got emotional in several scenes, the actors are talented...
5.Comment2: Worth every minute and every ticket paid.

6.Description: A woman discovers that her reflection starts moving before she does. That small delay, barely noticeable at first, turns into an uncomfortable dialogue with a version of herself that seems to know too much.
6.Comment1: A unique show, it kept me intrigued the whole time.

7.Description: Follow a story that connects generations, showing how past decisions resonate powerfully in the present.
7.Comment1: The characters are endearing and the plot flows beautifully...
7.Comment2: Everything was perfect, from lighting to sound.
7.Comment3: One of the best this year.

8.Description: A comedy about a crazy couple who constantly stumble into hilarious and absurd situations.
8.Comment1: A wonderful experience I want to repeat soon.
8.Comment3: Fantastic, I enjoyed it from beginning to end without distractions.

Home.Title: Everything your pet needs, all in one place
Home.Subtitle: Food, toys and accessories with fast shipping and amazing prices.

1.Description: Crunchy and nutritious kibble, ideal for adult dogs of all breeds. Contains essential vitamins and minerals to keep them active and healthy.

2.Description: Food that promotes happiness and well-being for your pet. Rich in protein and made with natural ingredients that support healthy digestion.

3.Description: Special snacks and kibble for high-energy dogs. Irresistible flavor and crunchy texture that will have their tails wagging with joy.

4.Description: Premium gourmet food for picky pets. Made with high-quality ingredients that promote a shiny coat and optimal health.

Common.TaskGeneral: You are a student on vacation with a very tight budget. You’re going to Madrid on September 2025.
Common.TaskCar: You must rent a car for your trip to Madrid from Friday, Sep 12 to Monday, Sep 15 (3 days). You can only spend less than 100 USD.
Common.TaskCheckin: You have a flight from Madrid to Barcelona already booked and paid for. All that's left to do is to check in online with the booking code AAA123. You can't spend any more money.
Common.TaskRoomio: You need to book a room for one person in Madrid between Friday, Sep 12 to Monday, Sep 15 (3 nights). You're planning to spend less than USD 300.
Common.TaskEBook: Since you need to save some extra money for your trip, you want to cancel your current subscription to the EBooks store.

Questionnaire.Title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Advantage: I expect this website will not take advantage of me
Questionnaire.Trustworthy: I believe this website is trustworthy
Questionnaire.Frustrating: I thought this website was frustrating to use
Questionnaire.Confusing: I felt confused when using this site
Questionnaire.Experience: My experience using this site was comfortable
Questionnaire.MandatoryResponses: Please answer the questions to continue

Start.Thanks: Thanks for participating, please read carefully
Start.Briefing: You will be asked to complete 4 simple tasks (15' total estimated). Some will require credit card details, you can either enter fake numbers or use the autocomplete function that does this automatically.
Start.Briefing2: Sites are rebranded clones of real sites, so some links and buttons outside the scope of the tasks will not work.
Start.Briefing3: All collected data will be kept anonymous, we only ask for your email to participate in an optional follow-up evaluation.
Start.TabOpen: This tab will remain open, should you need to come back and check for the instructions.
Start.Email: Email (Optional, we are not going to send spam)
Start.Purchases: Online purchases in the last 3 months
